1.0.name: wordpress/friendfeed-comments
1.0.description: This plugin will take the comments & 'likes' on your posts from FriendFeed and place them on the post that they're related to. The comments come with the person's name, a link to their FriendFeed profile & their FriendFeed image. Your blog's readers can also comment on & like your posts directly from a form displayed under the FriendFeed comments (this is an option that can be turned off)
